loonR 0.2.15
  • Reference

    k fold n times cross validation

    Source: R/Biomarker.R
    cross.validation.Rd

    k fold n times cross validation

    cross.validation(
  df = NULL,
  label = NULL,
  k = 5,
  n = 100,
  scale = TRUE,
  type = "response"
)

    Arguments

    df

    data.frame. Row is sample, col is gene

    label

    True label

    k

    Folds

    n

    Repeat times

    scale

    TRUE

    type

    "response" or "link"

    Value

    Examples

    cv.res <- loonR::cross.validation(miR.df[, cf.candidates],
            group == "Cancer",
            k = 10, n = 100)
#> Error in loonR::cross.validation(miR.df[, cf.candidates], group == "Cancer",     k = 10, n = 100): object 'miR.df' not found
